H0.text: In what country would you find Coptic Christians. Ethiopia

H1.text: In what country would you find Coptic Christians. Sudan

H2.text: In what country would you find Coptic Christians. South Sudan

H3.text: In what country would you find Coptic Christians. EGY

A4.text: Sudan has a native Coptic minority, although many Copts in Sudan are descended from more recent Egyptian immigrants.

A5.text: Copts are a Christian ethnoreligious group native to Northeast Africa who have primarily inhabited the area of modern Egypt since antiquity.
